summary: A future archivist looks at old footage from the year 2008 to understand why humankind failed to address climate change.
cast: Pete Postlethwaite|Jehangir Wadia|Alvin DuVernay|Layefa Malini|Jamila Bayyoud|Piers Guy|Lisa Guy|Fernand Pareau|Babou Ceesay|Toyah Frantzen|Mark Lynas
keywords: year 2008|runaway climate change|manmade environmental disaster|f rated|year 2055
title: La era de la estupidez
